name: Pancakes Efrat Shachor
ingredients: 1 cup milk - add slowly so it doesn't get too runny
instructions: Let it stand for a few minutes so it becomes airy (no need for a refrigerator.. literally five to ten minutes)
And put in a pan with oil that is already boiling.
A nice layer of oil. Not deep and not flat
Medium heat - because it's a bit tasty that the inside doesn't quite get ready all the way... or - however you like.
